name: lucky-chant
effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
short_effect: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.

flavor_text.black-white: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.
